name: Fairy Tale 2.0
description:
Rare of uncommon application Fairy Tale 2.0. All tales have professional sound scoring, and every tale-book has interesting games for your children. Try make your own scoring with your children with the application. Then you are in a trip, you can use the application offline without Internet connection.
And above all, beautiful and kind pictures with kind characters are waiting you in the application. And you can leave your kids in the adventure with them and don't worry. Quite and calm audio and kind pictures created specially to make good nigh.
All Popoff Developer Studio's applications are created for children. Education specialists and pedagogues are involved into design of the application. We are proud to recommend all our applications for family usage.
